article.headline: Hampton 59, Howard 30
article.story: NEW YORK (AP) -- Rashad West scored 18 points to lead Hampton to a 65-31 victory over Howard on Saturday night in the second game of the Big Apple Classic at Madison Square Garden. Virginia Union beat Bowie State 75-65 in the opener. Matthew Pilgrim added 11 points for the Pirates (4-3), who held a 28-13 lead at the half. Paul Kirkpatrick came off the bench to lead the Bison (3-5) with 10 points. After Jeron Smith's jumper got Howard even 7-7 at 11:59 of the first half, Hampton outscored the Bison 21-6 the rest of the half. West led the surge with six points. The Pirates outscored Howard 15-6 to start the second half and turn the game into a route, 43-19 at 15:50. A jumper by Jordan Brooks, his only basket, finished the run. Howard shot 11-of-40, including 1-for-13 from 3-point range.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
